name: Little ghost maze game
description:
Little ghost maze game. Maze with Dragons is a simple, but fun adventure game. This maze games with many levels playing for time will definitely touch everyone's feelings! Here you will search for treasures and escape from space dragons. Collect all coins on planets and pass all unique mazes before travel to another solar system.
The goal of this labyrinth game is to help a small charming creature to go through a multitude of labyrinths playing for time. And do not just pass the labyrinth, but get funny bonuses, overcome obstacles and show wit and logic!
Maze games with many levels "Labyrinth" will be interesting for children (due to vivid graphics and fun tasks), and adults who like to go through different types of labyrinths, check yourself for cleverness!
Download this maze adventure games and you’ll get:
Funny and entertaining maze games with many levels of varying degree of difficulty;

Convenient menu that will be a real pleasure not only for professional players, but even for children;

The possibility of choosing the character for which you will play in maze games;

Many bonuses and gifts that you can share with your friends;

Tell everyone that you are playing in labyrinth games Adventure Labyrinth! Compare your achievements with your friends while playing in Space Maze Game without the Internet connection.

Travel though all planets and beware the Dragon !
